verbs.description: HOMESTEAD , Fla. ( AP ) — [ARG0: U.S. Sen. Bill Nelson] [V: accused] [ARG1: the Trump administration] [ARG2: of a " cover - up "] [ARGM-TMP: after officials denied him entry Tuesday to a detention center for migrant children] i

HOMESTEAD , Fla. ( AP ) — U.S. Sen. Bill Nelson accused the Trump administration of a " cover - up " after [ARG0: officials] [V: denied] [ARG2: him] [ARG1: entry] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [C-ARG1: to a detention center for migrant children] i
